item.title: 瑞银称企业信贷市场正闪现自满迹象
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）称，从一个关键指标来看，随着债务估值接近数十年来的高点，美国企业信贷市场比股市表现出更大的自满迹象。【原文：Corporate credit markets in the US are exhibiting greater signs of complacency than the stock market by one key measure, as debt valuations approach multidecade highs, according to UBS.】

item.title: 关税是如何运作的？谁支付，谁征收
item.description: 随着美国关税的激增开始重新定义美国的贸易关系，美国消费者正在接受一堂关于进口税如何运作的速成课程。以下是基本知识。【原文：As radical increases in US tariffs begin to redefine the country’s trading relationships, American consumers are getting a crash course in how taxes on imports work. Here are the basics.】

item.title: 博通芯片通过连接小型数据中心为人工智能提供动力
item.description:
新型路由器可跨越 100 多公里共享更大量的数据

。【原文：

A new router shares larger volumes of data across more than 100 kilometers

】

item.title: 安德森公司以 4.25 亿美元收购马拉松合资公司剩余股份
item.description: 作物贸易商安德森公司（Andersons Inc.【原文：Crop trader Andersons Inc. said it acquired the remaining stake in its joint venture with Marathon Petroleum Corp. for $425 million.】

item.title: 尽管巴西销售额激增，但 MercadoLibre 仍未实现盈利
item.description: MercadoLibre Inc. 的股价下跌，原因是这家电子商务巨头的净收入未能达到分析师的预期，这盖过了该公司在巴西扩大免费送货政策带来的收入增长。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc.’s shares fell after the e-commerce giant missed analysts’ estimates for net income, overshadowing a jump in revenue from the expansion of the company’s free shipping policies in Brazil.】

item.title: 克莱尔餐厅拖欠租金，濒临破产申请
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Claire's Stores Inc. 离申请破产保护的日子越来越近了，因为这家青少年饰品连锁店决定不支付 6 月和 7 月部分店铺的租金。【原文：Claire’s Stores Inc. is inching closer to filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as the teen accessory chain elected to miss June and July rent payments on some stores, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Palantir 公布销售额增长 48%，称人工智能影响 "惊人
item.description: Palantir Technologies 公司报告称，第二季度收入增长了 48%，超过 10 亿美元，理由是人工技术对其业务产生了 "惊人的影响"。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. reported a 48% increase in revenue for the second quarter to more than $1 billion, citing the “astonishing impact” of artificial technology on its business.】

item.title: 比尔-比奇谈特朗普如何将美国经济数据政治化
item.description:
解雇 BLS 主任之后会发生什么？【原文：

What comes after the firing of a BLS chief.

】

item.title: CuspAI 正洽谈融资 1 亿美元以探索新材料
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，英国初创公司 CuspAI 正在洽谈筹集超过 1 亿美元的资金，以支持其利用人工智能模型发现新材料的目标。【原文：British startup CuspAI is in talks to raise more than $100 million in funding to support its goal of using artificial intelligence models to discover new materials, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新山公司考虑为 Azuria Water 成立 10 亿美元的二级基金
item.description: 新山资本公司（New Mountain Capital）正在考虑为其投资的 Azuria Water Solutions 公司进入二级市场，这是最近一家私募股权公司在艰难的交易环境中试图延长对一家投资组合公司的控制权。【原文：New Mountain Capital is considering tapping the secondary market for its Azuria Water Solutions, the latest private equity firm trying to extend its hold on a portfolio company in a tough dealmaking environment.】

item.title: 荷兰将从美国库存中向乌克兰供应 5 亿欧元武器
item.description: 作为美国倡议的一部分，荷兰将向乌克兰国防捐款 5 亿欧元（5.79 亿美元），成为第一个通过新计划捐款的北约国家。【原文：The Netherlands will contribute €500 million ($579 million) to Ukraine’s defense as part of a US initiative, making it the first NATO country to donate funds through the new program.】

item.title: 尼日利亚第一控股公司出售特殊目的公司持有的股份
item.description: 尼日利亚贷款公司 First HoldCo Plc 总经理表示，将出售一家特殊目的公司持有的该公司股份。【原文：Nigerian lender First HoldCo Plc will sell shares in it held by a special purpose vehicle, the managing director said.】

item.title: 基于区块链的贷款公司 Figure秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.已秘密申请首次公开募股，成为该行业积极进军公开市场的最新一家加密货币相关公司。【原文：Blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. has filed confidentially for an initial public offering, making it the latest crypto-related firm to take part in the industry’s aggressive push into public markets.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒的策略进行了有史以来第三大比特币购买活动
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的比特币巨头再次发力，以其他加密货币公司无法比拟的资本市场火力在高点附近买入。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin juggernaut is at it again, buying near the highs with the kind of capital-markets firepower no other crypto firm can match.】

item.title: 太空技术公司 Firefly 将 IPO 目标上调至 6.97 亿美元
item.description: Firefly Aerospace Inc. 将其首次公开募股的潜在规模提高到高达 6.97 亿美元。【原文：Firefly Aerospace Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to as much as $697 million.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称不再受中程导弹禁令约束
item.description: 俄罗斯外交部表示，俄罗斯不再受暂停部署地基中短程导弹的约束。【原文：Russia no longer considers itself bound by a moratorium on the deployment of ground-based intermediate and shorter range missiles, the Foreign Ministry said.】

item.title: 华尔街警告投资者做好股票下跌的准备
item.description: 华尔街最大的几家公司的股市预言家纷纷警告客户做好回调的准备，因为过高的股票估值会受到经济数据下滑的冲击。【原文：A chorus of stock market prognosticators at some of Wall Street’s biggest firms is warning clients to prepare for a pullback as sky-high equity valuations slam into souring economic data.】

item.title: 西班牙公用事业公司 Naturgy 出售 5.5% 股份以提高股票流动性
item.description: Naturgy Energy Group SA 正寻求通过两笔交易出售合计 5.5% 的股份，以提高股票的流动性，使其能够被纳入指数。【原文：Naturgy Energy Group SA is looking to sell a combined 5.5% stake through two deals, in an effort to boost liquidity in the stock and enable index inclusion.】

item.title: 人工智能其实是一个物理故事
item.description:
体育明星的比喻为何有效？【原文：

Why the sport stars analogy works.

】

item.title: 得克萨斯州批准为 NRG 在休斯顿新建天然气发电厂提供 2.16 亿美元贷款
item.description: NRG 能源公司从州立德克萨斯能源基金获得了 2.16 亿美元的低息贷款，用于在休斯顿建造一座新的发电厂。【原文：NRG Energy Inc. received a $216 million, low-interest loan from the state-run Texas Energy Fund to build a new power plant in Houston.】

item.title: 谷物和大豆在美国状况报告发布前维持在低位附近
item.description: 作物期货在芝加哥徘徊在近期低点附近，因为在周一晚些时候将发布的每周状况报告公布之前，美国田间天气仍大致良好。【原文：Crop futures were hovering near recent low levels in Chicago as the weather remained broadly favorable for US fields ahead of a weekly conditions report due later Monday.】

item.title: 德国财政部长计划向贝森特询问钢铁配额问题
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）计划在与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）会晤时提出欧洲钢铁配额问题。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil plans to bring up the issue of quotas for European steel when he meets with his US counterpart Scott Bessent.】

item.title: Figma 对长期支持者的追求使首次公开募股价格保持稳定
item.description: Figma 公司创纪录的首次公开募股涨幅正在降温，但仍给投资者带来了一笔意外之财，其中包括能够买到首次公开募股股票的特定机构，这引发了关于股票定价是否过低的争论。在幕后，吸引长期投资者的愿望影响了这一结果。【原文：Figma Inc.’s record-breaking debut gains are cooling, but they have still handed a windfall to investors including the select institutions that were able to get their hands on the IPO shares, sparking debate over whether the stock was priced too low. Behind the scenes, the desire to court long-term investors influenced the outcome.】

item.title: 巴克莱领跑 13 家高等级发行商，力争打破八月低迷局面
item.description: 在夏末美国投资级市场放缓之前，公司正利用市场反弹和借贷成本下降的大好时机出售债券。【原文：Companies are capitalizing on a broader market rebound and falling borrowing costs to sell bonds before a late-summer slowdown in the US investment-grade market.】

item.title: MUFG 行长呼吁日本央行提前加息以应对通货膨胀
item.description: 鉴于日本通胀上升的前景，日本最大银行的首席执行官希望日本央行尽早在下次会议上提高政策利率。【原文：The chief executive of Japan’s largest bank wants the Bank of Japan to raise its policy rate as early as the next meeting, given the outlook for higher inflation in the country.】

item.title: 伯克希尔股价下跌 3.4%，卡夫亨氏遭 38 亿美元重创
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Shares of Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. dropped as much as 3.4% on Monday after the conglomerate revealed a multibillion-dollar writedown in its second-quarter results and opted to forgo buybacks.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚发起回购全球债券的要约收购
item.description: 哥伦比亚宣布将用现金回购部分未偿还的全球债券，在人们日益担心预算赤字扩大的情况下，哥伦比亚希望重整其融资战略。【原文：Colombia announced it would repurchase some of its outstanding global bonds with cash, as it looks to revamp its financing strategy amid increasing concerns about the widening budget deficit.】

item.title: 就业数据疲软引发降息乐观情绪，标普500指数反弹
item.description: 周一早盘，美国股市走高，因为上周最新的就业数据显示就业增长大幅放缓，从而提升了美联储将降息以支持经济的预期。【原文：US stocks advanced early Monday after the latest employment data last week showed a sharp slowdown in job growth, lifting expectations the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates to support the economy.】

item.title: 列支敦士登 LGT 投资后，Teneo 估值 23 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，列支敦士登王室支持的一家基金正在收购通信和咨询公司 Teneo 的少数股份。【原文：A fund backed by Liechtenstein’s Princely Family is taking a minority stake in communications and consulting firm Teneo, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 调查显示欧佩克产量稳定，沙特的限制抵消了阿联酋的增长
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，由于沙特阿拉伯的减产部分抵消了阿拉伯联合酋长国的进一步增产，欧佩克上个月的原油产量保持稳定。【原文：OPEC’s crude production remained steady last month as a pullback by Saudi Arabia partly offset a further boost by the United Arab Emirates, according to a Bloomberg survey.】
